company.name: Ernst & Young Global Limited
company.description: EY is a global leader in assurance, tax, transaction and advisory services. The insights and quality services we deliver help build trust and confidence in the capital markets and in economies the world over. We develop outstanding leaders who team to deliver on our promises to all of our stakeholders. In so doing, we play a critical role in building a better working world for our people, for our clients and for our communities.
company.specialties: Advisory, Assurance, Tax, Transactions, Audit, Mergers, M&A, Financial Services, Accounting, Professional Services, Law, Technology, Consulting, Data, Transformation, Strategy, Legal, Digital transformation, Legal, Growth, and Managed Services

company.name: McKinley Rice
company.description: In a world full of ordinary, we create mobile applications for people with an extraordinary vision. It is easy to lose one's true self in this monotonous world, but since you are here looking for a team, we believe that you too are willing to go the extra mile.
company.specialties: International Commerce, Artificial Intelligence, B2B, Innovative Product Development, Foreign Direct Investment, Imports & Exports, Compliance and Controls, and Recruitment Services

institute.description: Jaypee Institute of Information Technology, Noida (JIIT Noida) was founded in 2001 with the aim to offer quality education in the fields of Engineering, Science, Management, IT, etc. It received the status of a deemed-to-be university in 2004. JIIT Noida is an integral part of Jaypee Group of Companies that currently provides education across 34 schools, five ITIâ€™s, 1 Polytechnic, Advanced Skill Development Centre, PG college, and B.Ed college, respectively.

Recognised as an 'Institute of Excellence' by the UGC, the University of Delhi (also known as DU or Delhi University) is listed among the country's most prestigious educational institutions. Established in 1922, Delhi Univerity has grown into one of India's largest universities with more than 6 lakh students under UG, PG, certificate, diploma, PG diploma and distance programmes. It is ranked 11 and 22 under the 'University' and 'Overall' categories by the NIRF 2023 Rankings, respectively. DU University has two campuses- North and South. It also has 91 colleges affiliated with it, along with 86 departments, 23 centres, 16 faculties and three institutes spread all across Delhi.
